Title: Pending
Description: The award was made, but the standstill period has not yet ended.
Deprecation note: Deprecated because the same information can be determined by comparing the sum of `awards.date` and `tender.standstillPeriod.durationInDays` (new in 1.2) to `date`.

Title: Active
Description: The award was made and the standstill period, if any, has ended.
Deprecation note: Deprecated because the same information can be determined by comparing the sum of `awards.date` and `tender.standstillPeriod.durationInDays` (new in 1.2) to `date`.

Title: Cancelled
Description: The award was cancelled by the buyer or the procuring entity (for example, because of a change in needs, insufficient funds, or technical or procedural errors) after the bid submission deadline, but before the award was made or before the standstill period, if any, had ended.
Deprecation note: OCDS 1.2 replaces this code with a new field for final states.

Title: Unsuccessful
Description: The award failed (for example, a review body cancelled the contracting process during the standstill period) after the bid submission deadline, but before the award was made or before the standstill period, if any, had ended.
Deprecation note: OCDS 1.2 replaces this code with a new field for final states.
